title: Bloomberg Markets: Rick Fox Says Son Inspired eSports Business
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Rick Fox Says Son Inspired eSports Business
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Rick Fox Owner Echo Fox Discussing how his own son's interest in eSports, rather than traditional sports, lead Rick to create his business.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
